channel.title: CVE Feed for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Hewlett Packard Enterprise -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-28084|2023-04-25T19:00:24.125Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20oneview
item.description: HPE OneView and HPE OneView Global Dashboard appliance dumps may expose authentication tokens

item.title: CVE-2023-39268|2023-08-29T19:38:58.346Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- arubaos-switch
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability in ArubaOS-Switch could lead to unauthenticated remote code execution by receiving specially crafted packets. Successful exploitation of this vulnerability results in the ability to execute arbitrary code as a privileged user on the underlying operating system.

item.title: CVE-2023-39266|2023-08-29T19:20:20.829Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- arubaos-switch
item.description: A vulnerability in the ArubaOS-Switch web management interface could allow an unauthenticated remote attacker to conduct a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) attack against a user of the interface provided certain configuration options are present. A successful exploit could allow an attacker to execute arbitrary script code in a victim's browser in the context of the affected interface.

item.title: CVE-2023-39267|2023-08-29T19:28:55.315Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- arubaos-switch
item.description: An authenticated remote code execution vulnerability exists in the command line interface in ArubaOS-Switch. Successful exploitation results in a Denial-of-Service (DoS) condition in the switch.

item.title: CVE-2023-50275|2024-01-23T17:10:14.116Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20oneview
item.description: HPE OneView may allow clusterService Authentication Bypass resulting in denial of service.

item.title: CVE-2023-50274|2024-01-23T17:02:38.098Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20oneview
item.description: HPE OneView may allow command injection with local privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2023-6573|2024-01-23T17:13:31.781Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20oneview
item.description: HPE OneView may have a missing passphrase during restore.

item.title: CVE-2024-22439|2024-06-04T17:52:46.976Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20flexnetwork%20and%20flexfabric%20products
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE FlexFabric and FlexNetwork series products. This vulnerability could be exploited to gain privileged access to switches resulting in information disclosure.

item.title: CVE-2024-22435|2024-04-15T09:06:09.732Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20nonstop%20web%20viewpoint%20enterprise%20software
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in Web ViewPoint Enterprise software. This vulnerability could be exploited to allow unauthorized users to access some resources on a NonStop system.

item.title: CVE-2024-22438|2024-04-15T09:37:46.770Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20officeconnect%201820%20network%20switches
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in Hewlett Packard Enterprise OfficeConnect 1820 Network switches. The vulnerability could be remotely exploited to allow execution of malicious code.

item.title: CVE-2024-22440|2024-06-04T17:52:38.714Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20compute%20scale-up%20server%203200%20server
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in HPE Compute Scale-up Server 3200 server. This vulnerability could cause disclosure of sensitive information in log files.

item.title: CVE-2024-22437|2024-04-15T09:21:40.627Z -- hewlett%20packard%20enterprise -- hpe%20msa%20san%20storage%20vss%20provider%20and%20capi%20proxy%20software
item.description: A potential security vulnerability has been identified in VSS Provider and CAPI Proxy software for certain HPE MSA storage products. This vulnerability could be exploited to gain elevated privilege on the system.
